CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_by_month (
    month_id INT,
    year INT,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (month_id, year)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_by_year (
    year INT,
    total_energy DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (year)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_by_region (
    region_id INT,
    year INT,
    energy_usage DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (region_id, year)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_trends (
    trend_id INT,
    trend_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    PRIMARY KEY (trend_id)
);

CREATE TABLE energy_consumption_metrics (
    metric_id INT,
    metric_name VARCHAR(255),
    trend_id INT,
    value DECIMAL,
    PRIMARY KEY (metric_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (trend_id) REFERENCES energy_consumption_trends(trend_id)
);
